text: -nnupa# naq A va#rtasva haqvyaM nO# vaqhEtiq sO$&bravIqd vara#M ~MvRuNaiq yadEqva gRu#hIqtasyAhu#tasya bahiHpariqdhi skandAqt tanmEq BrAtRu#NAM BAgaqdhEya#masaqditiq tasmAqd-yad-gRu#hIqtasyAhu#tasya bahiHpariqdhi skanda#tiq tEShAqM tad BA#gaqdhEyaqM tAnEqva tEna# prINAtiq sO#&manyatAsthaqnvantO# mEq pUrvEq BrAta#raqH prAmE#ShatAqsthAni# SAtayAq itiq sa yAnyaq- [  ] 43
